display.floating-tooltip: ${bsh: import org.ofbiz.base.util.*; (UtilValidate.isNotEmpty( context.get("wepaFromDateFrom") ) ? UtilDateTime.getFormattedDate( context.get("wepaFromDateFrom") , "dd/MM/yyyy" , timeZone , locale ) + " - " : "" ) + (UtilValidate.isNotEmpty( context.get("wepaWorkEffortEtch") ) ? context.get("wepaWorkEffortEtch") + " - " : "") + (UtilValidate.isNotEmpty( context.get("wepaWorkEffortName") ) ? context.get("wepaWorkEffortName") : "") }

"&orderBy=" + context.get("orderBy") : (UtilValidate.isNotEmpty(parameters.get("orderBy")) ? "&orderBy=" + parameters.get("orderBy") : "")}&${arrayListExtraParams}

set.value: ${bsh: import org.ofbiz.base.util.*; return UtilValidate.isNotEmpty("noteInfo") ? (noteInfo.length() > 70 ? noteInfo = noteInfo.substring(0, 67) + "..." : noteInfo) : ""}
